channel.title: Blogs on Chandan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Chandan's Blog

item.title: Probability Density Estimation
item.description: Introduction In statistics and Machine Learning, we often get to work with data samples. These samples are used to estimate the behaviour of the population. In inferential statistics, density estimation is used to derive informations about the population.

item.title: Sentence Autocompletion Using N-Gram Language Model
item.description: We almost use Google everyday for web surfing. And you would must have come across the thing that you see in the above picture. Its amazing, isn’t it!

item.title: Introduction to Machine Translation in NLP
item.description: Imagine yourself in 1800s and you plan a travel to France being a native english speaker. It would have been nearly impossible to communicate with native French speaking community.

item.title: Hypothesis Testing
item.description: Science has never been defined by infallibility or superhuman perfection. It has always been about healthy skepticism, about putting every hypothesis to the test.Â - Ben Orlin, Math with Bad Drawings
